Morning Bid: Fed minutes calm the horsesA look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan Thu, 04 Jan 2024 11:09:19 GMT HTTY5NVYENNAVGHURSMRQTGQ64 https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/global-markets-view-usa-2024-01-04/Reuters市场美国市场
Citi targets China investment bank unit launch, 30 new hires by end 2024-sourceCitigroup Inc is aiming to launch its wholly owned China investment banking unit as early as the end of this year and hire about 30 people for the business, a person with direct knowledge of the matter said. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 10:09:40 GMT MNMALQUJJRN3NEQWUYVBYN5NLA https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/citi-targets-china-investment-bank-unit-launch-30-new-hires-by-end-2024-source-2024-01-04/Selena Li商业金融
China's 'ice city' Harbin draws record tourists over New Year holidayThe "ice city" of Harbin, the snowy capital of northeast China's Heilongjiang province, attracted a record number of visitors over the New Year holiday, many of them drawn by the grand and intricate ice sculptures of its annual Ice and Snow Festival. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 10:06:40 GMT IKTXP4USLBN2TBGPRWSU6DZFME https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-ice-city-harbin-draws-record-tourists-over-new-year-holiday-2024-01-04/Reuters世界中国
China's Xi sends condolences to Iran president on 'terrorist attack'China's President Xi Jinping sent a message of condolence to the Iranian president on Thursday for the "terrorist attack" a day earlier, Chinese state television CCTV said. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 09:56:27 GMT QFCQZEWY45OALCFCDLIWVQDVUA https://www.reuters.com/world/chinas-xi-sends-condolences-iran-president-terrorist-attack-2024-01-04/Reuters世界
China sees international flights reaching 80% of pre-COVID levels by end-2024China's aviation regulator said on Thursday it expects the number of international flights to and from the country to reach 6,000 per week by the end of this year, or about 80% of pre-COVID levels. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 08:53:03 GMT R7L4FSMFMZOX5MWLYET6IVOP4U https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-sees-international-flights-reaching-80-pre-covid-levels-by-end-2024-2024-01-04/Reuters世界中国
China targets better integration of EVs, grids to manage power demandChina's state planner has issued new rules on strengthening the integration of new energy vehicles with the electric grid, as the world's biggest market for electric vehicles (EVs) aims to manage its power demand amid a transition to renewable energy. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 08:36:32 GMT DG24EYG2NJPMBE6776P2ESI2IM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-targets-better-integration-evs-grids-manage-power-demand-2024-01-04/Colleen Howe商业带电
China protests to Myanmar after stray artillery shells hurt fiveChina has protested to Myanmar over five people injured after artillery shells lobbed during battles between its ruling junta and rebel groups strayed into a small town near their border, a foreign ministry spokesperson said on Thursday. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 07:16:47 GMT 4TXL5LA6QZOAPOTZHUHXLQZ2WQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/artillery-shells-restive-myanmar-region-hit-southwest-china-town-global-times-2024-01-04/Reuters世界亚太地区
Taiwan spots more Chinese balloons, says one flew over islandTaiwan's defence ministry said it had detected three more Chinese balloons flying across the Taiwan Strait on Wednesday, and one of those flew over the island, the second day in a row it has reported such activity. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 03:21:03 GMT GQ4KE3E56JKGZLDYIZS6PTFYLQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-spots-more-chinese-balloons-says-one-flew-over-island-2024-01-04/Reuters世界亚太地区
Chinese provinces warn of thick fog, dozens of Shanghai flights delayedExtremely heavy fog in several Chinese provinces on Thursday led to dangerously low visibility, closing highways, delaying flights out of Shanghai and prompting weather forecasters to release a string of warnings and advisories. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 02:17:20 GMT VP3QD7VF4BLDVCYN7VJVTGMHAU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinese-provinces-warn-thick-fog-dozens-shanghai-flights-delayed-2024-01-04/Bernard Orr世界中国
China's Dec services activity expands at quickest pace in 5 monthsChina's services activity expanded at the fastest pace in five months thanks to a solid rise in new business, a private-sector survey showed on Thursday, lifting the degree of optimism in the sector to a three-month high. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 01:51:20 GMT DDA3F7X4ANILIVIV4AV2HES3GWY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-dec-services-activity-expands-quickest-pace-5-months-caixin-pmi-2024-01-04/Reuters市场宏观问题
Taiwan says will publish analysis of China's alleged election interference post voteTaiwan's foreign minister says it is documenting its experiences with China's alleged attempts to interfere in elections next week and will publish its analysis soon after the vote.
